name: archivebox
description: ArchiveBox is a powerful tool to save and preserve snapshots of websites for long-term archival. It supports input sources like bookmarks, RSS, Pocket, and captures full HTML, media, and PDF exports with searchable UI.
features: Website Archival: Save complete snapshots of websites for long-term preservation. Never lose content.
Multiple Formats: Capture HTML, PDF, screenshots, media, and more. Comprehensive archiving.
Import Sources: Accept bookmarks, RSS feeds, Pocket, and direct URLs. Flexible input.
Searchable UI: Web interface for browsing and searching archived content. Find anything quickly.
Automated Capture: Schedule regular archiving of important sites. Set it and forget it.
Self-Hosted: Store your web archive on your own infrastructure. Complete control.
Open Standards: Export archives in standard formats for portability. Future-proof preservation.
